title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2371.4 - Location and hours for inspection of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2371.4 - Location and hours for inspection of records

State Regulations

Records shall be available for inspection and copying by a
data subject, or his authorized representative, at the times and locations
specified in section
2370.6
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2371.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
